external_games.name: Biyoushi Debut Monogatari: Top Sutairisuto wo Mezasou!

name: Biyoushi Debut Monogatari: Top Sutairisuto wo Mezasou!
storyline:
In this game, the player works as a rookie hairdresser at a popular hair salon in town, gaining experience while learning various hair styling techniques from seniors, and has a simulated experience of growing into a full-fledged stylist.

In addition to basic haircuts such as shampooing, blow-drying, cutting, and perming, you can enjoy various hairstyle techniques in mini-games, and you can also enjoy conversations with unique customers who visit the store.

In addition, by devising the length of hair, how to cut it, how to color and perm it, you can create more than 1000 hairstyles, and you can make the character who is the player's alter ego do your own hairstyle.
summary: Become a coveted beautician and have a hands-on experience!
